metadata.Title: CVE-2018-6178 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: Eliding from the wrong side in an infobar in DevTools in Google Chrome prior to 68.0.3440.75 allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install a malicious extension to Hide Chrome Security UI via a crafted Chrome Extension.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
oxide-qt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
